com.sun.multicast.reliable.applications.testtools
Class PropManager

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.sun.multicast.reliable.applications.testtools.PropManager
public class PropManager
extends java.lang.Object

Manages properties file and stores properties. Opens default.properties, checks for some command line stuff for overide info then stores results in the JRMS.properties file.
